channel.title: Error ll Webclient
channel.description:
okay, so i got my bluurr client into a nearly done web-client after much work..
and when i get it working, i am planning to make a tut for it.
okay..
now, when the cache downloads / extracts the client stops and says [error connecting retrying in "seconds"]
okay in the error log, i see this:
C://.SiskoPlanet_file_cache_32/User/Screenshots/Thumbs.db {access denied}
anyone knows how to fix this?

item.title: Error ll Webclient
